Questions.Title: Nabucodonosor II, legendary Babylon king
Questions.Body: Nabucodonosor II never managed to conquer Jerusalem. As a matter of fact, he is remembered for going insane due to his obsession for the city.

Questions.Title: Rome's Women
Questions.Body: In ancient Rome, a widow had the authority to maintain relationships with other men.

Questions.Title: The Rise of a Modern Metropolis
Questions.Body: The Empire State Building, in May 1930, counted 102 floors.
